message: I have a great deal for you, Bob! I'm willing to sell this amazing product to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $110 is a bit high for me.  I'm willing to pay $95 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $105.
